name: Standard Room
description: This cozy room offers a comfortable double bed, perfect for solo travelers or couples. The room features a modern design with warm colors and includes a work desk, a flat-screen TV, and a small seating area. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, complimentary toiletries, and fluffy towels. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping service.

name: Standard Double Room
description: The suite features a separate bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living room with a sofa and armchairs, a dining area, and a private balcony with stunning views. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a bathtub, a separate shower, and premium toiletries..

name: Single Bed Room
description: Our Single Bed Room is designed for solo travelers looking for a comfortable and cozy space. The room features a plush single bed, a work desk, and a private bathroom with a shower. Relax after a long day of exploring the city or attending meetings and enjoy the convenience of our in-room amenities.

name: Balcony Room
description: Our Balcony Room offers a relaxing retreat with a private balcony overlooking the city skyline. The room features a comfortable king-sized bed, a seating area, and a spacious marble bathroom with a bathtub and separate shower. Step out onto your balcony to enjoy the fresh air and panoramic views.

name: Windowed Bedroom
description: Our Windowed Bedroom offers a comfortable and well-lit space with a large window that lets in natural light and offers views of the surroundings. The room features a queen-sized bed, a work desk, and a modern en-suite bathroom with a shower. Enjoy a peaceful stay with the convenience of our in-room amenities.

name: Standard Single Room
description: Our Wooden-themed Room offers a cozy and rustic atmosphere, with wooden furnishings and accents that create a warm and inviting ambiance. The room features a comfortable king-sized bed with a wooden headboard, a wooden desk and chair, and a wooden wardrobe. The en-suite bathroom is elegantly designed with wooden finishes and includes a shower and complimentary toiletries.

name: Suite Room
description: Our Suite offers a luxurious and spacious accommodation, perfect for those looking for an indulgent stay. The suite features a separate bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living room with a sofa and armchairs, a dining area, and a private balcony with panoramic views. The marble bathroom includes a bathtub, a separate rain shower, and premium toiletries for a relaxing experience.

name: Emperor Room
description: Our Emperor Room epitomizes luxury and opulence, offering a grand living space fit for royalty. The room features a majestic king-sized bed with lavish bedding, a spacious seating area with elegant furnishings, and a dining area for private meals. The marble bathroom is a sanctuary of indulgence, complete with a deep soaking tub, a separate rain shower, and premium toiletries. Enjoy breathtaking views of the city skyline from your private balcony.
